description:
Christmas Advent Calendar is a digital version of the traditional advent calendars loved by everyone at Christmas time!

Advent doors remain locked until the 1st December. You can then open one door each day in the run up until Christmas Day  Clicking a door reveals a cute Christmas character or icon. Help your children learn their numbers and get into the Christmas spirit by opening a new door with them each morning.

Characters and icons include: Father Christmas (Santa), snowman, Rudolph, Christmas tree, robin, stocking, snow flakes, presents, decorations and much more!

It’s cheaper than those chocolate versions and much more festive!

Includes an option to reset all the doors, so you can use it next year!

****************************************

Also includes a bonus Christmas themed matching pairs memory game!

****************************************


(If for some reason you want to use the app at other times of the year simply set your device system date to the 31st December as this will allow you to open all doors)
